---
title: "About"
description: |
  This web-site contains all the data and R-code necessaries to replicate the results of the study: Air Quality Alerts and School Absences: Evidence from New York City.
author: "Luis Sarmiento"
---

All the raw files needed to run the code are in the [dropbox repository](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/1jyjs84sef7t1nt/AABtbantKPm4OyICNEIklpXLa?dl=0)

If you want to replicate the study:

::: {.nonincremental}
- Download all files in the Dropbox Repository (Consider space constraints in your computer)
- The Dropbox files are structured as follows:

::: nonincremental
- 01_RawData -- Includes the raw data-files as obtained from the New York State Department of Education, the New York State Department of Environmental Conservation, The Environmental Protection Agency, and the Census Buro. 
- 02_GenData -- Contains the data-files I use for the analysis. 
- 03_scripts -- Here, I include all the R-scripts I use to transform the raw data into a useful format, perform descriptive statistics, and run my empirical specifications
- AQAs_School_Absences_NYC -- This folder contains the Quarto files necessary to replicate this web-site
:::
:::
